wikitext.*:
{{actor | image = Ian Holm.jpg | name=Ian Holm | lifetime=[[12 September|September 12]], [[1931]] - [[19 June|June 19]], [[2020]] | played=[[Frodo Baggins]] | film=[[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]] | played2=[[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo]] | film2=[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]]
[[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]] | imdb= [https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0000453/ Profile] }} '''Sir Ian Holm Cuthbert''' [[Order of the British Empire|CBE]] ([[12 September]] [[1931]] - [[19 June]], [[2020]]) voiced [[Frodo Baggins]] in the BBC radio adaptation of ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings]]''. Years later he played [[Bilbo Baggins]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]], and Old Bilbo in [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]]. Ian Holm was the father of [[Harry Holm]], who played [[Elanor Gardner|Elanor Fairbairns]] in the 1981 radio series. ==Quotes== {{quote|Bilbo is a character to whom things seem 'to happen'! But once put to his mettle, once put to the test, he comes up trumps.|Ian Holm, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Official Movie Guide]]''}} {{quote|These things are like boats with toes.|Ian Holm about prosthetic Hobbit feet}} ==Roles== * [[2014]] - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' - Old [[Bilbo Baggins]] * [[2012]] - ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' - Old Bilbo Baggins * [[2007]] - ''[[The Real Middle-earth (documentary)]]'' - Narrator * [[2003]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' - Bilbo Baggins * [[2002]] - ''[[The Making of The Lord of the Rings (documentary)]]'' - Bilbo Baggins (archive footage) * [[2002]] - ''[[A Day in the Life of a Hobbit]]'' - Himself, Bilbo Baggins (archive footage) * [[2001]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' - Bilbo Baggins * [[2001]] - ''[[Quest for the Ring]]'' - Himself, Bilbo Baggins (archive footage) * [[1981]] - [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]] - [[Frodo Baggins]] ==Awards== * [[2002]] - '''[http://www.cinemaclips.com/PFCS.htm PFCS Award]''', Best Acting Ensemble, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' * [[2004]] - '''[http://www.bfca.org/ Critics' Choice Award]''', Best Acting Ensemble, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' * 2004 - '''[http://www.nbrmp.org/ NBR Award]''', Best Acting by an Ensemble, ''Peter Jackson's The Return of the King'' * 2004 - '''[http://www.sagawards.org/ SAG Award]''', Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture, ''Peter Jackson's The Return of the King'' == External links == * {{WP|Ian Holm}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Holm, Ian}} [[Category:Actors and actresses]] [[Category:British people]] [[Category:People by name]] [[Category:The Lord of the Rings (film series) cast]] [[Category:The Hobbit (film series) cast]] [[de:Ian Holm]] [[fi:Ian Holm]]
